Step Forward: 2017-2018
Secure your future
Thank you for previously registering your interest in the Step Forward 2017 - 2018 programme.
We wanted to check in and make sure that you can take the next steps needed to start your journey.
Remind me again, what is Step Forward?
Step Forward is a unique school leaver programme brought to you by The Challenge.
As a Step Forward Associate you'll benefit from the advice and support of a personal mentor, while receiving personal and professional development training in the classroom and on the job. Throughout the year you'll earn a Â£9,000 salary, discover what it takes to succeed and build the networks needed to excel.
What next?
Step Forward 2017 - 2018
If you plan to stay at school / college for another year you should fill out our 10 minute application form today. Please log onto our website using your email address and pin/password below.
www.stepforward.uk.com
